pages.text: It can be tricky to bring maids with you while traveling far or crossing different dimension. Introduce Aya's Camera, which is a simple solution to this problem. $(br2)Take a photo of your maid using this camera will "seal" your maid into that photo; you can release your maid from photo by rightclicking on desired positon.
If you have an Album with you, newly taken picture will directly go into the Album. Rightclicking the album will release maids (on a first in first out basis?).
